Texting_Sequence_1: ^hey Emerald! I hope you’re doing well [emoji:smile]
^sorry, I know it’s really late lol
^do you remember those vocaloid videos we made back in high school?
^I just found a sketch of Memi in one of my notebooks
^Amika!!! Hey, it’s nice to hear from you!
^I could never forget our little sun-shaped guy!
^he’s still the mascot my vocaloid acct on YouTube

s: ^I drew my BUTT off for that video!
^well, you’re the one who wrote the song haha

c-0: ^I was up every night working on it. I barely slept that month!
c-1: ^you were up every night after school animating the lyric video for a MONTH. that means it’s your song too!
g-0: ^you were a great artist even back in high school. No wonder you got that awesome job in Burbank right out of college [emoji:heart]

c-3: ^seriously, don’t make me come all the way over there [emoji:mad]
^okay, okay! I’m super-great and I deserve this extremely-cool job, please don’t hurt me haha [emoji:joy]

g-1: ^it’s really nice of you to text. I had no idea you were still thinking about all those old mascot characters and lyric videos we made
^I don’t think I’ve touched my DAW in ages lol
^how come? You always loved playing around with Miku, GUMI, and the others.
^I guess I haven’t really used voice synthesizers for anything since I started music school
^but anyways! Hbu? Are you still following [artist name], [artist name] and everybody?

c-4: ^I just don’t have time for that kind of stuff anymore
^totally, I'm super busy these days too! but always glad to keep you in the loop lol
^I appreciate it :) I'm pretty far out of the loop at this point though. like deep space
^I'll rope you back in! like how they space lassoed matt damon in that movie
^haha good to know you'll always catch me up.
c-5: ^I wish I could keep up with it more. I wouldn’t know any new songs unless you posted them haha
^yeah I bet you’re busy living it up in Burbank!
^hardly lol more like busy trying to stay afloat

g-3: ^I'm really sorry I haven’t messaged more often.
^how’s California so far? don't tell me you say "stoked" and "beggle" now :O

c-6: ^so great you’ll never come back haha
^sorry, I wanted to make it over the summer!
^all the artists and animators are putting in extra time to get the new season out. I couldn’t get free [emoji:fearful]
^I’m just giving you a hard time! maybe we can meet up over Thanksgiving?
^my folks are going to visit me out here actually . . . they want to escape the Illinois cold for a bit
^oh that sounds fun. but I’m coming after you for that raincheck!
c-7: ^everything's crazy. I haven’t been able to think straight or take a breath
^I’m alright, it’s just that working at an animation studio is somehow even harder than I thought it would be
^I feel like I’m playing catch up with everyone else and just trying to make it till the next deadline
^I have no idea why they picked me. I might not be cut out for this
^I felt the same about school you know
^are you kidding? or did I dream up all those amazing Chicago Youth Symphony recitals?
^dude those take me way back, that feels like forever ago [emoji:joy]
c-8: ^oh my gosh no I have no chill lately
^um when did you have chill to begin with??

g-4: ^how about you? how are things back in Chicago?
^did you do anything fun during break?
^your music program had fall break already right?
^oh yeah I didn’t do anything though lol

c-9: ^LOL as if! sleep is for the weak
c-10: ^there are no breaks after graduation, you know
^thanks mom LOL I just didn't feel like doing anything special

g-5: ^what else are you doing this semester?
^I mean not much compared to you!!
^drawing all day and spotting celebrities, I’m jealous haha
^no no it’s not like that! I’m just a prop artist, I don’t get to meet the voice talent. and all the spottings are over in silver lake xD
^you're closer to your dream than a lot of people get! you’re totally on your way to being a great director
^directing might not be my dream anymore actually

c-12: ^it's harder to be disappointed if you reset your expectations
^hmm. does giving up actually save yourself the disappointment or just front load it?
^like are you actually changing your mind or are you letting your fear make the decision?

^if you don’t want to anymore that’s totally your choice! plans change. but I hope you’re not counting yourself out because you think you CAN’T do it. you’re an amazing artist, Amika! you have so much to be proud of already. if it means anything, I’M proud of you :)
^oh wow that means the world to me!! I appreciate you saying that Emerald, you always know how to cheer me up :)
c-13: ^I'm nothing like the directors at my studio
^I know I'm only starting out but I just feel invisible sometimes. I don't know why anyone would care what I have to say
^isn't it worth sharing your stories even if it feels like no one's listening?

^if you don’t want to anymore that’s totally your choice! plans change. but I hope you’re not counting yourself out because you think you CAN’T do it. you’re an amazing artist, Amika! you have so much to be proud of already. if it means anything, I’M proud of you :)
^oh wow that means the world to me!! I appreciate you saying that Emerald, you always know how to cheer me up :)

g-6: ^you have nothing to be sorry for!
^well if I ever do make a film you’re my first choice for music! I know you would write a killer score
^have you been working on any new songs for class?
^not really - I’ve actually been spending more time listening lately.
^I’m working on a post right now about nostraightanswer, have you heard of them?
g-7: ^nostraightanswer is a really good vocaloid artist!
^I've had this song “Wishing Well” on repeat. I find it soothing, it’s been keeping me going this year.
^if you listen to it you'll see! if you need a pressure valve from the rush of the city it might help
^plus, it has beautiful lyrics. I think about them a lot, actually
^anyway sorry to head out so soon but I have to finish up this post and head off to work to work, I got stuck with the graveyard again rip
^your school library has a graveyard shift??
^oh I work off campus now! so yeah crazy hours
^bummer . . . maybe they’re hiring somewhere else on campus?
^I checked but all the on campus jobs are taken actually
^but I really do have to go now, you should look up the song!
g-8: ^anyway, I should go. but talk later?
^definitely! I should probably get some sleep too
^maybe I’ll listen to nostraightanswer’s song while I lie down
^sweet dreams, and let me know if you have any more Memi sightings! [emoji:heart]
